casebody.data:
PHG ASHEVILLE, LLC
v.
CITY OF ASHEVILLE 434PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 4, 2019

Catherine A. Hofmann, Assistant City Attorney, Thomas E. Terrell, Jr., Kip David Nelson, Andrew H. Erteschik, Chad W. Essick, R. McGrath, N. Cosmo Zinkow, Attorneys at Law, Robin Tatum Currin, City Attorney, FOR City Of Asheville.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of June 2019 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of June 2019."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 28th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
